title: How to Make Peanut Butter Haystacks

steps.headline: Place the desired number of pieces of bread onto the cutting board.
steps.description: Arrange the bread into two rows. You can use as much or as little bread as you'd like.

steps.headline: Get out the bowl.
steps.description: In it, combine both the 3 1/2 cups of coconut flakes and the amount of peanut butter desired, stirring until all of the coconut flakes have peanut butter on them.

steps.headline: Get out the spreader or butter knife.
steps.description: Start spreading the the peanut butter and flakes onto only one side of just the first bread slice.

steps.headline: Do the same for the other slices if you have more.
steps.description: Be sure that you leave the other bread slices without a spread, as they'll go on top of the sides that have the spread on them.

steps.headline: Sprinkle the cinnamon on, if desired.
steps.description: The cinnamon should go on only the slice with the spread on it.

steps.headline: Top the slices of bread that have the spread with the slices of bread that have nothing on them to complete the sandwich.
steps.description: Serve the sandwiches as soon as possible.

text: Place the desired number of pieces of bread onto the cutting board. Arrange the bread into two rows. You can use as much or as little bread as you'd like. Get out the bowl. In it, combine both the 3 1/2 cups of coconut flakes and the amount of peanut butter desired, stirring until all of the coconut flakes have peanut butter on them. Get out the spreader or butter knife. Start spreading the the peanut butter and flakes onto only one side of just the first bread slice. Do the same for the other slices if you have more. Be sure that you leave the other bread slices without a spread, as they'll go on top of the sides that have the spread on them. Sprinkle the cinnamon on, if desired. The cinnamon should go on only the slice with the spread on it. Top the slices of bread that have the spread with the slices of bread that have nothing on them to complete the sandwich. Serve the sandwiches as soon as possible.
